chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : System) (a b c d : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal c d) -> SysPrf T (iffH (LT a c) (LT b d))

Premises:
System = fol.System LNN : Type
equal = fol.equal LNN : fol.Term LNN -> fol.Term LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
iffH = fol.iffH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
LT = fun x y : Term => atomic LNN Languages.LT (Tcons LNN 1 x (Tcons LNN 0 y (Tnil LNN))) : Term -> Term -> Formula
eqPlus : forall (T : System) (a b c d : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal c d) -> SysPrf T (equal (Plus a c) (Plus b d))
eqTimes : forall (T : System) (a b c d : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal c d) -> SysPrf T (equal (Times a c) (Times b d))
eqTrans : forall (T : System) (a b c : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal b c) -> SysPrf T (equal a c)
eqSym : forall (T : System) (a b : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal b a)
eqSucc : forall (T : System) (a b : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal (Succ a) (Succ b))
eqRefl : forall (T : System) (a : Term), SysPrf T (equal a a)
folLogic3.eqTrans : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (a b c : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L b c) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a c)
BinInt.Z.divide_div_mul_exact : forall a b c : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.divide b a -> BinInt.Z.div (BinInt.Z.mul c a) b = BinInt.Z.mul c (BinInt.Z.div a b)
iffTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g h) -> SysPrf T (iffH f h)
iffSym : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g f)
folLogic3.eqSym : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (a b : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L b a)
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
BinInt.Z.div_exact : forall a b : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> a = BinInt.Z.mul b (BinInt.Z.div a b) < -> BinInt.Z.modulo a b = BinNums.Z0
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
BinInt.Z.pow_gt_1 : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) a -> BinInt.Z.lt BinNums.Z0 b < -> BinInt.Z.lt (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) (BinInt.Z.pow a b)
ListExt.In_list_remove2 : forall (A : Set) (Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a b : A) (l : list A), In a (ListExt.list_remove A Aeq_dec b l) -> a <> b
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
BinInt.Z.ldiff_le : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.ldiff a b = BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 a /\ BinInt.Z.le a b
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
andI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g)
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
BinInt.Z.mod_divide : forall a b : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.modulo a b = BinNums.Z0 < -> BinInt.Z.divide b a
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
BinInt.Z.bits_inj' : forall a b : BinNums.Z, (forall n : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 n -> BinInt.Z.testbit a n = BinInt.Z.testbit b n) -> a = b
iffRefl : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f f)
nnI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH (notH f))
nnE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (notH (notH f)) -> SysPrf T f
impTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T (impH f h)
BinInt.Z.ldiff_neg : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt (BinInt.Z.ldiff a b) BinNums.Z0 < -> BinInt.Z.lt a BinNums.Z0 /\ BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 b
andE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T g
orI2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
andE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T f
orI1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
BinInt.Z.shiftr_ldiff : forall a b n : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.shiftr (BinInt.Z.ldiff a b) n = BinInt.Z.ldiff (BinInt.Z.shiftr a n) (BinInt.Z.shiftr b n)
BinInt.Z.lor_spec : forall a b n : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.testbit (BinInt.Z.lor a b) n = (BinInt.Z.testbit a n || BinInt.Z.testbit b n)%bool
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
forallSimp : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T f
existSimp : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (existH v f)

original: intros T a b c d H1 H2. apply iffI. - apply impE with (LT a c) (LT b d). + apply impE with (equal a c) (equal b d). * apply sysExtend with T. apply H1. apply eqSym. apply eqTimes. apply eqRefl. apply eqRefl. * apply sysExtend with T. apply H2. apply eqTimes. apply eqRefl. apply eqRefl. + apply iffE1. * apply impE with (LT a c) (LT d c). { apply sysExtend with T. apply eqSym. apply eqSucc. apply eqRefl. } { apply sysExtend with T. apply eqTrans with c a. apply eqSym. apply eqSucc. apply eqRefl. apply eqSym. apply eqSym. apply eqRefl. } * apply iffE2 with (LT d c) (LT b d). { apply sysExtend with T. apply eqSym. apply eqSucc. apply eqRefl. } { apply sysExtend with T. apply eqSym. apply eqTrans with b d. apply eqSucc. apply eqRefl. apply eqSym. apply eqSym. apply eqRefl. } - apply impE with (LT b d) (LT a c). + apply impE with (equal b d) (equal a c). * apply sysExtend with T. apply H2. apply eqSym. apply eqTimes. apply eqRefl. apply eqRefl. * apply sysExtend with T. apply H1. apply eqTimes. apply eqRefl. apply eqRefl. + apply iffE1. * apply impE with (LT b d) (LT c a). { apply sysExtend with T. apply eqSucc. apply eqRefl. } { apply sysExtend with T. apply eqTrans with d b. apply eqSucc. apply eqRefl. apply eqSym. apply eqSym. apply eqRefl. } * apply iffE2 with (LT c a) (LT a c). { apply sysExtend with T. apply eqTrans with d b. apply eqSucc. apply eqRefl. apply eqSym. apply eqSym. apply eqRefl. } { apply sysExtend with T. apply eqSym. apply eqSucc. apply eqRefl. }
